title: Client Freezes Before Entering Champion Selection PLEASE HELP IF YOU CAN
body: I never had a problem with this before but I think this started possibly 6 months ago where whenever I start a game on summoners rift and everyone accepts the pop-up/ afk check, the client freezes  and the sound queue starts for about 10-25 seconds before I finally enter champ select. It's really frustrating because it forces me to play draft pick just for me to have a chance to get the role I want. My friends really like blind pick and want me to play with them but if I do, I'll always end up joining late in champ select, not even seeing who called what lane because the client freezes for so long before I can do anything. Does anyone else have this problem? If anyone knows how to solve this issue or have any ideas to how it even started, please send feedback. I don't lag in game or have any other issues with the client except this one where it freezes up before I enter champ select. Thank you for your time.

replies.body: When you accept a match, the server is grabbing everyone together into the same group.  It sounds like your network might be having trouble keeping a strong connection, and leaving you behind.  I recommend tuning up your connection and fix up whatever is causing this desync by going over the instructions in our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide.  Hope that helps!
